document_title: Purulent tonsillitis: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content: Many people are worried and wonder: is the disease contagious? In fact, although it is a respiratory disease caused by bacteria or viruses, studies show that tonsillitis or purulent tonsillitis is not contagious from person to person.
subsection_title: viem amidan hoc mu.json. Is purulent tonsillitis contagious?
subsection_data:
viem amidan hoc mu.json. Is purulent tonsillitis contagious?
Many people are worried and wonder: is the disease contagious? In fact, although it is a respiratory disease caused by bacteria or viruses, studies show that tonsillitis or purulent tonsillitis is not contagious from person to person.
